item.title: Some help?
item.dc:creator: @fedexer -fedexer-
item.description:
@fedexer wrote:

lol its simple you need to make your code look like this mate

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1552) { if (misc.random2(25) <= 20) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("he"));{ npcs[i].textUpdate = "shh...he's here!"; }else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "He isn't here, hehe"; } } }

item.title: Some help?

item.description:

hey it’s been awhile and i can’t remember how to fix
